reviewText: DVD is excellent and as described! Thank You! A+++
Bought it for my three year old son as he is learning to skateboard and everyone enjoys watching the tricks.

If you are an avid fan of skateboarding then this dvd is necessary for your collection.  It provides a comprehenvise look at all the x games competitions from beginning to recent years including all the best runs.  I certainly learned a lot from watching this dvd.

This DVD is a comprehensive look back at the first 10 years of X-Games skateboarding. The main feature neatly and chronologically summarizes what went down at each event (vert, street, best trick, etc.) for each year (1995-2004). The top 10 finishers for each event are conveniently listed at the end of each segment. A well organized DVD, chapter advance brings you straight to the next event.

Bonus features include a brief slam montage, profiles of some of the skaters, additional footage of the Philly street competition, the many attempts leading to Tony Hawk's first 900, and all the 1st place runs for each event for each year in their entirety. Truly a video worth every penny. Can't wait for the next 10 years!
